About

What is OPS-SAT?

OPS-SAT is a European Space Agency mission aiming to test novel concepts in a low cost orbiting experiment platform. It aims to break the vicious cycle of “has never flown, will never fly“ currently present in spacecraft engineering.

What is onboard OPS-SAT?

A bunch of commercial off the shelf components (COTS), such as:

  • High resolution camera
  • Multiple FPGA reconfigurable SoCs

What is an FPGA?

Why are FPGAs not used in space already?

What does our experiment plan to test?
